mapper.select: SELECT RNO, BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BHITS, ID, BDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BHITS, ID, to_char(BDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BDATE FROM(SELECT * FROM MYCGV_BOARD ORDER BY BDATE DESC)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT ROWNUM RNO, BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BHITS, ID, to_char(BDATE, 'yy-mm-dd') bdate FROM(SELECT * FROM MYCGV_BOARD ORDER BY BDATE DESC)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYCGV_BOARD(bid, btitle, bcontent, bhits, id, bdate, bfile, bsfile) VALUES('b_'||LTRIM(to_char(sequ_mycgv_board.nextVal, '0000')), #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, 0, #{id}, sysdate, #{bfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update mycgv_board set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} where bid=#{bid}
update mycgv_board set bhits=(bhits+1) where bid=#{bid}
